File Tree.h¶

↰ Parent directory (necsim)

Contains the main simulation object for spatially-implicit coalescence simulations.

Contents

  • Definition (necsim/Tree.h)
  • Detailed Description
  • Includes
  • Included By
  • Classes

Definition (necsim/Tree.h)¶

  • Program Listing for File Tree.h

Detailed Description¶

Provides the basis for spatially-explicit versions in Class SpatialTree, and protracted speciation versions in Class ProtractedTree and Class ProtractedSpatialTree. MIT Licence.
